title: Spectate server problems
body:
http://i.imgur.com/xjphtxS.png
Since two weeks ago perhaps...? This keeps popping up now and then when spectating.
Playing the game itself has no issues.

Connection: NZ Spark VDSL

replies.body:
Hey there,

This sounds to me like it might be caused by an intermittent connection issue on your end.

Could you try running through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for me, let me know if the issue persists.
